alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 28 at 4:50PM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
